attributes.action: Get Virgin Media to provide faster upload speeds to their home customers.
attributes.additional_details:
If you go to this website then you can see what I'm talking about
 http://www.virginmedia.com/shop/broadband/speeds.html
attributes.background: VirginMedia limits their upload speed going on their download, I'm a YouTuber and when I'm uploading videos every day and they are talking 30+ Minutes to upload a video for my fans. It starts taking up a lot of my time and I don't want to spend too much money on my internet just to get fast upload!

rejection.details: This petition is calling on Virgin Media, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
